title: Message beads + mail tooling
description:
scope: message bead schema, inbox/outbox skills, optional CLI mail
acceptance: message beads first-class; mail skills implemented; docs updated
changeset_strategy: schema doc + skills + optional CLI wrapper

title: Define message bead schema + helpers
description: acceptance: message bead format documented; helper functions for YAML frontmatter; tests added

title: Implement mail skills (send/inbox/mark read)
description: acceptance: mail_send/mail_inbox/mail_mark_read skills operate on message beads; tests added

title: Add atelier mail CLI wrapper
description: acceptance: overseer-only mail CLI surfaces inbox/send; docs updated

title: Planner skills + changeset guardrails
description:
scope: plan_create_epic, plan_split_tasks, plan_changesets
acceptance: planner skills create epics/tasks/changesets with guardrails
changeset_strategy: skill scaffolds then rule enforcement

title: Add plan_create_epic skill
description: acceptance: skill creates epic bead with required fields/labels; tests added

title: Add plan_split_tasks skill
description: acceptance: skill creates tasks/subtasks under epic with labels; tests added

title: Add plan_changesets guardrails
description: acceptance: skill creates changeset beads with guardrails; prompts on violations; tests added

title: Wire atelier plan to planner skills
description: acceptance: plan command drives planner skill flow (epic -> tasks -> changesets); docs updated

title: Changeset lifecycle + review state
description:
scope: track PR/review lifecycle for changesets
acceptance: review state stored; publish/integration updates; bead comments/labels as needed
changeset_strategy: metadata model + skill updates

title: Define changeset review metadata schema
description: acceptance: PR metadata fields defined; helper parses/updates description; tests added

title: Add review-state update skills
description: acceptance: skills update pr_state/urls for changesets; ready for publish/integration flow

title: Document changeset lifecycle
description: acceptance: docs cover changeset states + PR lifecycle mapping; publish/finalize guidance updated

title: Documentation alignment
description:
scope: update SPEC/behavior/AGENTS for beads-first model
acceptance: docs reflect new plan/work roles and beads conventions
changeset_strategy: update northern-expedition + spec/behavior/agents

title: Update docs/behavior.md for beads-first workflow
description: acceptance: behavior docs reflect plan/work roles, beads usage, no SUCCESS.md

title: Update docs/SPEC.md for beads-first workflow
description: acceptance: spec reflects new CLI surface, beads roles, changeset lifecycle

title: Update README/templates for beads-first workflow
description: acceptance: README + templates reflect new commands and bead usage; SUCCESS.md removed

title: Status + GC/prune commands
description:
scope: surface hooks/claims and cleanup stale work
acceptance: atelier status + gc/prune commands operating on beads
changeset_strategy: status first, then gc/prune

title: Add atelier status command
description: acceptance: status shows hooks/claims/ready epics/worktrees; tests added

title: Add atelier gc command
description: acceptance: gc clears stale hooks/claims and stale agent heartbeats; tests added

title: Add atelier prune command
description: acceptance: prune removes stale worktrees/agent homes per policy; tests added

title: Beads-first workspace intent
description:
scope: remove SUCCESS.md and attach workspaces to bead epics
acceptance: no SUCCESS.md for new workspaces; bead id required for work; docs updated
changeset_strategy: config + open/init updates + docs

title: Remove SUCCESS.md from templates/workflows
description: acceptance: new workspaces no longer include SUCCESS.md; docs/templates updated

title: Require bead id for workspace intent
description: acceptance: workspace config records epic bead id; open/work enforce bead association; no legacy fallback

title: Rationalize open/init for beads-first flow
description: acceptance: open/init behaviors match beads-first model (no head); prompts list epics/workspaces; tests updated

title: Agent identity + claim/hook flow
description:
scope: agent ids, bead hooks, claim semantics
acceptance: claim/hook skills; agent bead updates; hook stored as source of truth
changeset_strategy: identity plumbing then claim/hook skills

title: Add agent identity config + bead helpers
description: acceptance: agent id sourced from env/config; agent bead helper exists; plan/work require identity

title: Implement epic claim/hook semantics
description: acceptance: claim updates epic status/assignee; agent hook stored; draft epics excluded; work command claims when selecting

title: Add worker skills for claim/release/heartbeat
description: acceptance: skills added for claim_epic, release_epic, hook_status, heartbeat, work_done; tests updated

title: Implement worktree-based workspaces
description:
scope: replace workspace clones with git worktrees per epic
acceptance: worktrees created/attached, cleanup updated, tests passing
changeset_strategy: small steps (layout, create/attach, cleanup, tests)

title: Create/attach git worktrees per epic
description: acceptance: work command creates git worktree at epic path when missing; worktree reuse supported; tests updated

title: Add worktree detach helpers
description: acceptance: worktree removal helper added for gc/prune use; tests updated

title: External ticket linking
description:
scope: link beads to external ticket systems without importing all data
acceptance: external ticket refs stored; sync/close skills defined
changeset_strategy: schema + minimal sync skill

title: Add external ticket schema + helpers
description: acceptance: external_tickets schema defined; helper parses/updates description; labels added; tests added

title: Add external sync/close skills (stubs)
description: acceptance: skills defined for external_import/sync/close; config-driven provider stubs; docs updated

title: Atelier data directory layout + agent homes
description:
scope: move atelier state into data dir; add per-agent home dirs and AGENTS
acceptance: data dir layout matches rethinking doc; agent homes created/managed; worktrees/beads resolved via data dir
changeset_strategy: config+paths first, then agent homes, then migration-free wiring

title: Add data dir resolver + config
description: acceptance: platform data dir resolved (XDG/macOS); project config stores data dir; tests updated

title: Route beads/worktrees/skills/agents to data dir
description: acceptance: beads/worktrees/skills/agents paths resolve under data dir; work command uses new layout; tests updated

title: Add per-agent home dirs + AGENTS template
description: acceptance: per-agent home directories created; AGENTS.md template written; plan/work read agent identity from home

title: Pivot Atelier to Beads-first workflow
description:
scope: workspace-first overlay on Beads
acceptance: beads-backed planning + worker flow established
changeset_strategy: small, reviewable changesets; branch naming <epic-id>-n
backcompat: none

title: Dogfood Beads in repo + conventions
description: acceptance: beads initialized, conventions documented, initial epics/tasks created

title: Add Beads skill scaffolding
description: acceptance: beads skill exists for agent usage (prime/sync/show/ready)

title: Implement Beads location config + discovery
description: acceptance: project config records beads location; discovery prefers repo, else project store

title: Add plan/work CLI entrypoints + worker modes
description: acceptance: planner/worker commands exist; prompt vs auto modes supported

title: Add worktree + changeset branch mapping
description: acceptance: worktrees map to epic bead; changeset branches tracked in workspace config

title: Claim atomicity
description:
scope: bd-only vs sqlite claim locking
acceptance: claim path implemented with optional sqlite guardrail
changeset_strategy: bd-only first, sqlite optional

title: Implement bd-only claim with verify
description: acceptance: claim path updates assignee/status then re-reads; conflicts handled; tests added

title: Add optional SQLite claim lock
description: acceptance: sqlite-backed claim lock optional via config; gc clears stale locks; tests added
